title: Boards profile picture?
body: Is there something I'm supposed to do to change it? It's a "?" I read around that it's supposed to be the same as my in game picture but it's not.

replies.body:
Weeeeeeell that's no fun not being able to show off fancy icons. As far as I can see it looks like you recently switched to the Arcade Ahri icon. There might be something weird going on with that icon specifically. 

I want to try something to see if this is only affecting that icon, so I'd like to have you change your icon really quick and post here again to see if the new icon will show or not!

Lol magically showed up. I mean I wouldn't say recently, I had it for over a month or so. :P
And before that I had the big Tibbers paw for years. 

Whatever happened it got fixed so thank you.

Sooooo I may not have actually saw the time when you changed it, just that it was the most recent change. Ya caught me skimming xD!

I'm glad it finally fixed itself at least!
